D

DBManager - Class in server.controller
 
DBManager(String, String, String) - Constructor for class server.controller.DBManager
Constructor for DBManager with SQL credentials
display() - Method in class client.view.LogoutFrame
displays the LogoutFrame, which terminated shortly after by a System.exit(1) call from server
display() - Method in class client.view.ServerMessageFrame
display() displays the message to the screen via JFrame, whos "OK" button is controlled by a ServerMessageController
displayCourseNotFoundError() - Method in class server.controller.CourseCatalogue
displays an error if searchCat() can not find a particular course
displayFrame() - Method in class client.view.LoginFrame
displayFrame() is the method that creates and displays the login frame that is used to take user input (Student ID), and has buttons whose actions are managed by a LoginFrameController
displayFrame() - Method in class client.view.MenuFrame
displayFrame() is the method that creates and displays the menu frame for the user, who can then dictate what actions to take via numerous buttons.
displayFrame() - Method in class client.view.RegisterForCourseFrame
displayFrame() is the method that creates and displays the RegisteForCourseframe for the user, who can then input various parameters to determine which course to register for.
displayFrame() - Method in class client.view.ViewAllCoursesFrame
displayFrame() displays all courses in the course catalogue to a GUI that can be viewed by the user, and is controlled by a ViewAllCoursesController, instantiated at the end of the method
displayFrame() - Method in class client.view.ViewRegisteredFrame
displayFrame() displays all courses that are registered by the user (Student) in a GUI interface for the user to browse, and whose button/input actions are controlled by a ViewRegisteredController which is instantiated at the end of the method
dispose() - Method in class client.view.LoginFrame
 
dispose() - Method in class client.view.ViewAllCoursesFrame
dispose() cancels/deletes the frame
dispose() - Method in class client.view.ViewRegisteredFrame
dispose() deletes the frame
